description:
* Based on an action-adventure fantasy manga written by http://anidb.net/cr68714 [Yamada Kanehito] and drawn by http://anidb.net/cr68715 [Abe Tsukasa].
Elf mage http://anidb.net/ch130947 [Frieren] and her courageous fellow adventurers have defeated the Demon King and brought peace to the land. With the great struggle over, they all go their separate ways to live a quiet life. But as an elf, Frieren, nearly immortal, will long outlive the rest of her former party. How will she come to terms with the mortality of her friends? How can she find fulfillment in her own life, and can she learn to understand what life means to the humans around her? Frieren begins a new journey to find the answer.
Source: Viz
Note: The first four episodes received an early screening at a special event on September 23, 2023 at six different cinemas across Japan. The regular TV broadcast started on September 29, 2023.

REGULAR.description:
The world celebrates the Demon King`s defeat at the hands of the Hero and his companions. Now that their great adventure is over, what will Frieren the mage do next?
Source: Crunchyroll

Frieren instructs Fern in the use of magic while deciphering a grimoire for Heiter.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: It Didn`t Have to Be Magic...
別に魔法じゃなくたって...

REGULAR.description:
While retracing the path she took on her adventure with her former traveling companions, Frieren confronts an old enemy.
Source: Crunchyroll

Frieren and Fern pay a visit to Eisen, who requests their help in finding the notes of Flamme the Legendary Mage.
Source: Crunchyroll

Frieren and Fern investigate ghost sightings at a village where people have started going missing.
Source: Crunchyroll

Frieren and Fern enlist Stark`s help to fight the solar dragon - but is he up to the task?
Source: Crunchyroll

After reflecting on the transient nature of the past as it exists in people`s collective memories, Frieren unexpectedly runs into a sworn enemy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: おとぎ話のようなもの

REGULAR.description:
As tensions in Graf Granat`s domain reach a breaking point, Fern and Stark find their own resolve - and Frieren resumes an old duty.
Source: crunchyroll

While Fern and Stark make a temporary retreat with Graf Granat, Frieren`s true foe awaits her outside the city.
Source: crunchyroll

Frieren`s many years of training under her teacher Flamme are tested in her confrontation with Aura the Guillotine. Will Aura`s scales find her wanting?
Source: crunchyroll

Frieren and her companions continue their journey through the northern lands, but obstacles both natural and manmade still stand in their way.
Source: crunchyroll

Deep in the mountains of the northern lands, Frieren and her party arrive at the Village of the Sword, where they have another job to do.
Source: crunchyroll

While passing by a village in the woods of the northern lands, Frieren and party meet Sein, a gifted priest who is nonetheless corrupt enough to give even Heiter a run for his money. But what happened in his past?
Source: crunchyroll

The party arrives in a large and lively town with a bustling shopping district that Frieren once visited with Himmel, but something seems to have come up between Fern and Stark.
Source: Crunchyroll

When the party happens upon a town whose inhabitants are all mysteriously asleep, it`s time for their newest traveling companion to prove his mettle.
Source: Crunchyroll

Frieren pays a visit to Old Man Voll, a long-lived friend of hers, with traveling companions in tow.
Source: crunchyroll

Now that Sein finally has a lead on the whereabouts of his long-lost friend, is it time for him and Frieren`s party to part ways?
Source: crunchyroll

Frieren and party finally arrive in Äußerst, ready to undergo the first-class mage exam, and meet a number of colorful characters who are there to do the same.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`examen de mage de premier niveau
一級魔法使い選抜試験

REGULAR.description:
Frieren and her new teammates hatch a plan to capture a Stille - but are the other teams just going to stand by and let it happen?
Source: crunchyroll

The first-class mage exam intensifies as fighting breaks out between the participants - and what`s at stake might even be worth killing for.
Source: crunchyroll

Frieren, Kanne, and Lawine struggle with the 13th party over possession of the Stille, but there`ll be more surprises in store before their battle, and the first test, reach their conclusion.
Source: crunchyroll

After the conclusion of the first test, the exam participants have some time to kill in town. What do mages get up to on their days off?
Source: Crunchyroll

The aspiring first-class mages now face their second test: conquering the Ruins of the King`s Tomb. A simple task, or so the proctor claims, but there`s a reason this particular dungeon remains unexplored.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sousou no Frieren x ZIP! Taibou no Anime-ka! Miryoku Kaibou SP
葬送のフリーレン×ZIP! 待望のアニメ化! 魅力解剖SP
"Sousou no Frieren" ga Mitaku Naru Mahou
『葬送のフリーレン』が見たくなる魔法

●●の魔法 第3回: 朝決まった時間に起きれるようになる魔法
OO Magic Episode 4: The Magic That Makes Your Body Smell Good
OO no Mahou Dai 4 Kai: Karada Kara Yoi Nioi ga Deru Mahou
OO Magic Special Episode: The Magic of Happiness at the Table
OO no Mahou Tokubetsuhan: Shokutaku o Shiawase ni Suru Mahou
●●の魔法 特別版: 食卓をしあわせにする魔法
OO Magic Episode 5: The Magic That Brings Good Luck
OO no Mahou Dai 5 Kai: Un ga Yoku Naru Mahou
OO Magic Episode 6: The Magic That Removes Persistent Oil Stains
OO no Mahou Dai 6 Kai: Shitsukoi Abura Yogore o Otosu Mahou
●●の魔法 第6回: しつこい油汚れを落とす魔法
OO Magic Episode 7: The Magic of Being Able To Speak Extremely Fast and Without Hestitation
OO no Mahou Dai 7 Kai: Monosugoku Hayakuchi ni Yodomi Nake Shabereru Mahou
●●の魔法 第7回: ものすごく早口に澱みなく喋れる魔法
OO Magic Episode 8: The Magic to Understand a Fish`s Feelings
●●の魔法」第8回：「魚の気持ちがわかる魔法

SPECIAL.description: Frieren`s Party encounter three treasure chests. Fern cautions that at least one of them must be a mimic, so Stark suggests using the magic that brings good luck. The first chest contains gold and treasure, and the second chest contains a rare grimoire. To their dismay, Frieren insists on opening the third chest, which is a mimic. She gets caught and yells that it is dark and scary inside, and Fern wonders if Frieren did this on purpose.

titles.title: OO Magic Episode 9: Magic that Brings Good Luck - Part 2

2778.name: slow when it comes to love

5213.name: the effects of time and distance on human relationships

titles.title: Frieren - Oltre la Fine del Viaggio
Frieren e a Jornada para o Além
Frieren: Más allá del final del viaje
Frieren: Nach dem Ende der Reise
